intro: Stenogyne conscandens, commonly known as the Kauai slender-leaf heliotrope, is a flowering plant native to the Hawaiian Islands. It belongs to the family Lamiaceae, which includes many aromatic herbs and shrubs. The plant is characterized by its slender, hairy stems and small, tubular flowers that are typically purple or violet in color. It thrives in moist, shaded environments, often found in coastal and lowland habitats. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
